mapper.select: SELECT mbr_seq, mbr_id, mbr_pw, mbr_seq, mbr_name, mbr_total_point, mbr_total_exp, mbr_birthdate, mbr_gender, mbr_height, mbr_weight, mbr_exercise_goal, mbr_exercise_experience_level, mbr_exercise_target, mbr_knee_health_considered, mbr_noise_considered, mbr_long_sitter, mbr_neck_shoulder_focused, mbr_back_disk_considered, mbr_profile_url FROM member WHERE mbr_id = #{mbrId}

SELECT mbr_seq, mbr_id, mbr_pw, mbr_name, mbr_total_point, mbr_total_exp, mbr_birthdate, mbr_gender, mbr_height, mbr_weight, mbr_exercise_goal, mbr_exercise_experience_level, mbr_exercise_target, mbr_knee_health_considered, mbr_noise_considered, mbr_long_sitter, mbr_neck_shoulder_focused, mbr_back_disk_considered, mbr_profile_url FROM member WHERE mbr_seq = #{mbrSeq}

SELECT pt.PT_SEQ, pt.TRN_SEQ, MBR_SEQ, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY pt.TRN_SEQ ORDER BY PT_RESERVATION_DATE ASC) AS PT_COUNTS, PT_RESERVATION_STATUS,PT_CANCELLATION_REASON, PT_CREATION_DATE, PT_RESERVATION_DATE, PT_LESSON_DURATION, PT_LESSON_START_DATE, PT_LESSON_END_DATE, PT_NOTE_STICKERS, -- REVIEW PTR_SEQ, PTR_CONTENT, PTR_CREATION_DATE, PTR_STICKERS, PTR_RATING, -- Trainer t.TRN_ID, TRN_NAME, TRN_TYPE, TRN_TYPE_NAME ,TRN_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, TRN_PROFILE_URL FROM PERSONAL_TRAINING pt JOIN (SELECT TRN_ID,TRN_SEQ, TRN_NAME, TRN_TYPE, CODE_NAME AS TRN_TYPE_NAME, TRN_PROFILE_URL, TRN_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM TRAINER JOIN COMMON_CODE ON CODE_NUMBER = TRN_TYPE) t ON t.TRN_SEQ = pt.TRN_SEQ LEFT JOIN PERSONAL_TRAINING_REVIEW ptr ON pt.PT_SEQ = ptr.PT_SEQ WHERE MBR_SEQ = #{mbrSeq}
AND PT_RESERVATION_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND PT_RESERVATION_STATUS IN (1,2)
AND PT_RESERVATION_STATUS IN (2, 3, 4)
ORDER BY PT_RESERVATION_DATE ${order} OFFSET ${page-1} * 5 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
